website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic VX2858Sml is an energy-efficient 28-inch multimedia monitor that delivers a sharp HD picture and looks good doing it, but it comes up short on features.

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I'm now updating my review, Right after I got it a few weeks go I had run into some issues then called VeiwSonic. For all the negative things I read about them online....they were awesome, No hassling or anything. After I sent it in it took about a week to get the new one, but so far I love it and I'm glad I didn't just return it. I hope to be able to purchase a second on in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love it, highly recommend it, the price/utility/quality is hard to beat...
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Price was great too, I use the speakers too, even though they are not for quality music listening, but for video conferencing or watching a game are perfect. I also want to point out the blue light turn off option. We use it, it is good to feel that we don't have blue lights in our eyes before bed time, but I didn't notice any difference in our ability to sleep after using these monitors. I have been using two of them for months now and there are no complaints by any family member. They are running hours every day...
customer_reviews.author: M3 Fan

customer_reviews.title: Huge Monitor - No Eyestrain!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge step up from the 17" LCD on my old notebook PC. My old eyes appreciate the larger text and the increased number of pixels. LED illumination is uniform from edge-to-edge, with no weird edge effects. I particularly appreciate the DC backlight intensity, rather than the high frequency pulse width modulation scheme that's often used, where the pulses are faster than humans can perceive, but it nonetheless produces eye strain. I spend way too much time in front of my PC, and this is a wonderful feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture and easy to set up and get working
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture and easy to set up and get working. Keep in mind this is a standard HD monitor so text and icon will seem large but is great for someone that wants to use the monitor with our their glasses. Took a while to understand the settings interface and raise the volume. Still it would be 5 stars except the monitor sits slightly askew with the stand properly mounted. No adjustments can be made. A small rubber foot was used to level it which was much less of a hassle than returning it for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are having problems with the resolution on this monitor read this review
customer_reviews.text: There is a known problem with AMD/ATI video cards not displaying a full screen image so if it appears that this monitor has blurry text or isn't displaying the full size look at this link. It took me less then 5 minutes to fix the problem and now the monitor is great! At first I had the blurry text and was worried, but I just couldn't believe that Viewsonic would put out a subpar 28" monitor out of the box....and I was right. The monitor is great the problem is with the video card. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Kmill

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, I love having the extra inch compared ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as one of my XBOX One Stations. Great picture, I love having the extra inch compared to my other 27 inch monitors. It also has 2 hdmi ports so you do not need to use a splitter when hooking up a computer or 2nd game system. It has built in speakers which is a plus. They do not have amazing sound but it is nice to have them if you need them. Turning the volume up and down is a little bit of a chore since it is buried in the menu system and not a dedicated rocker. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory and Kim Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a NUC
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a monitor that had multiple inputs and that had a VESA mount which could be used at the same time the monitor was on its stand. This configuration allowed me to hang a NUC on the back of the monitor while having the monitor on my desk using the normal stand. I use the monitor daily with my MacBook Pro and use the input select buttons to switch between the MacBook and the NUC that runs a web app and requires only occasional direct connection. Brightness and picture quality are good for normal business use.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. MUSSER

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best monitor I have purchased. Its resolution is extremely unique and although it took me a while to find how to manipulate the settings I finally got there and it made the product an even greater satisfying buy. The best part about this monitor is the screen adjustment view where you can tilt it downwards or upwards depending on what angle suits you best. I hooked it up to my PS4 and my gaming experience has shot through the roof. I am very grateful to have the privilege to own such things such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: I took a shot with this one and am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I work from home. I had been using my laptop display and another 21" monitor. Now I'm using the 21" monitor and this 28" monitor. This has proven to be a big improvement. I also purchased a separate HDMI cable and Apple Thunderbolt adaptor to use with my Mac. Works perfectly. I'm very please with this purchase. When selecting a new monitor there were MANY choices, options, sizes, etc. I took a shot with this one and am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: NOT too BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I fought my husband when he bought this monitor for me. I previously was using a 17 inch piece of junk (it's our backup monitor) as my 21-inch monitor died. Anyway, I really thought that this would be WAY too big of a monitor. Um, NO! It is perfect. I am at the age where I need reading glasses and had to flip back and forth between reading and regular glasses with my old monitor. Not with THIS one. I can just use my regular glasses. LOVE IT!! Definite recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: TiggerTeddie

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We did have to adjust the brightness
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was everything the reviews said it would be. We love it! We did have to adjust the brightness, but that wasn't a surprise as I'd read in several other reviews that we would. The picture quality is great for online streaming and videos. It's a great value for the price. I think this monitor quality compares to several-much more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. A really big difference in shades ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. A really big difference in shades of colors and details of complex shapes. I had no idea of how much I was NOT seeing.
customer_reviews.author: K Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and go with a better known brand
customer_reviews.text: Had (2) of these that I ordered together. Had one go out a few weeks ago and now the other has as well. Always had a few issues that required me to turn them on and off to fix before they finally gave out. Won't be ordering Viewsonic again. Do yourself a favor and go with a better known brand. I'd expect to at least get longer than a year out of a monitor before it gave out. I did contact warranty and they offered to fix it if I shipped the monitor back to them first which by that stage I'd already have half paid for a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Skinner

customer_reviews.title: What? I can see you but I can't hear you.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Nice, crisp and clear image. Don't rely on the built in speakers, they are terrible. But that could be because the right side speaker on mine does not work. Plenty of hook up options. This is not height adjustable. Very thin and light weight. If you aren't concerned about the speakers, don't hesitate to order this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Hippolytus

customer_reviews.title: This is a five star monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my son with this monitor for his fourteenth birthday and he was really happy. It's huge, lightweight, and very easy to set-up. The color is amazingly beautiful and the monitor works very well. I am so happy Amazon is able to offer us good deals like this so we can give awesome gifts at affordable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated to windows 10, needed better higher resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Not only a great price, but I would have had a much smaller screen at a local store. This seems enormous after my 21". I upgraded to Windows 10 and though my old monitor was not that old it did not have the required screen resolution, this one did &did not break the bank. Speakers useless, but most screenspeakers are. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is OK for its price that by the ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is OK for its price that by the way, still going in decline...monitor does not automatically get detected by your system to configure and adjust itself if you are running windows 7 or higher. The CD provided for installation supports windows XP platforms and older therefore, does not help at all with newer systems and configuring and adjusting color, brightness , etc., etc. is difficult. The manual color adjustment buttons are not user friendly either. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Overall great for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Image is sharp and clear. It's light weight and overall looks neat. Funny, because it doesn't feel like a 28" monitor, it looks low profile. I am bringing that up, keeping Apple cinema 27" as my visual reference. Anyway, you can't beat this for such a low price monitor - recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Boheme

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is BEAUTIFUL! I am so very pleased with how amazing it is for such a low cost!! I am probably going to have to buy my husband one now, because he is jealous that mine is better! haha We are both loyal ViewSonic customers. No other monitor has lasted so long and stayed great! :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for six months I deployed for 9 months I came back and the power cord stopped making contact with the port on the monitor now I can't keep it on unless I'm pressing it down the whole time... Didn't realize people could be so cheap but that's what I get for being cheap as well ...
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Cabello

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - Great Performance!
customer_reviews.text: Good, economical, and easy to set up. What more can you say about a monitor? The picture is nice. I don't know about the sound because the PC it is connected to is mainly used for email. Photos and webpages display very nicely. In my opinion, it is a good item, at a fair price with fast and FREE shipping with Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: SandieJ

customer_reviews.title: Monitor flashes off and on, at random times. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor with one exception. It starts flashing off and on every once in awhile. Then it pops up a window that says to change to a different screen resolution, even though I already have it on that resolution. It's connected to a Dell desktop as a second monitor. The Dell monitor does not do that flashing thing. Just this ViewSonic. I have not found a way to get the flashing to stop. It starts on its own and it stops on its own. Next time I will pay a little more to get a different brand of monitor. This monitor is entirely useless when it starts flashing on and off like that. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: TWG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color a great price. Looks HUGE at first from my 22 inch but as a gamer what a big difference for my 60 year old eyes. I don't use the front speakers, but they do sound OK. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ephraim

customer_reviews.title: and looks great. No dead
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, works, and looks great. No dead, dark, or bright pixels so far as I can tell. Base requires a philips screwdriver to install, but seems pretty solidly-attached. This monitor might be missing some parts, as it is impossible to screw the video cable into place -- I'm unsure if this is a bug or a feature, as the cable otherwise seats pretty well. (The silver, threaded sheaths, into which the cable screws should fit, are missing. But the cable doesn't seem inclined to fall out, even with some jostling, so it's fine for me.)
customer_reviews.author: Tenley Schofield

customer_reviews.title: I have always had good experiences with Viewsonic
customer_reviews.text: Very Big - Very Bright - just what I wanted to ease the eye strain of daily computer use. No compaints at all, I have always had good experiences with Viewsonic products
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Terry

customer_reviews.title: You'll like what you see!
customer_reviews.text: The big screen is great and is why I bought the monitor. I found it fairly easy to setup. The only problem that I had is the built in sound bar. It plays way too softly and I tried to resolve the problem but couldn't so I use the speakers on my desk. I am fairly happy since I really bought this for the monitor. Other than the sound I haven't come across any problems since I've been using the monitor in March 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vucekovich

customer_reviews.title: Just... just look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: After about a year and a half of light use, it's not producing the totally distorted image one of the other reviewers shared. Pretty disappointed that the shelf life of this product was so short. Granted it wasn't a high end model, but for the amount I paid, I should get some decent years out of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad as a christmas present to replace his smaller monitor. He loves it! Says having a larger monitor with clear and crisp pictures and text has done wonders. Its not as hard on his eyes and he can view car schematics on one screen instead of having to scroll. Great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Loaded monitor with sound and awesome picture
customer_reviews.text: Best quality 28" monitor under $200. Resolution is great, responsiveness is great, blacks are black... and it has built in sound? WHAT? Yes... this monitor is awesome. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: coryalex

customer_reviews.title: Pedestal sort of rocky.
customer_reviews.text: Other than unstable pedestal this monitor is great considering it is inexpensive and the resolution is as good as my 27" ASUS MX279H. The screen is semi-glossy. I recommended this monitor for its price point alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A. Seneris

customer_reviews.title: A BIG DIFFERENCE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a slew of Samsung monitors. Always said I wouldn't have anything but a Samsung, but fate has a funny way of changing destiny and I let a friend talk me into getting the ViewSonic. Probably the best monitor I ever owned! Good product!
customer_reviews.author: G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: good clarity on the monitor
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are weak (as expected), good clarity on the monitor. Don't know if there's really much of a difference, but I like the idea of the blue light filter.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: but overall TV works great. And for the price
customer_reviews.text: Screen clarity can be a little iffy at times, but overall TV works great. And for the price, who can complain. Delivered on time, no packaging issues, easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and has an extra inch on the 27 inch class monitors. Bought an AOC 27 inch first and returned it, a quarter of the screen was dark, obviously defective. Thought I would spend a little more for quality and I got it.
customer_reviews.author: jb3amz

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent monitor, it's so sharp I can hardly believe ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor, it's so sharp I can hardly believe it. I'm going to buy a second one so I have two in order to work at home when need be.
customer_reviews.author: GarySten

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  Big.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. As I get older I find myself seeking larger and larger pixels. This is nice and should last me a few years before I up-size again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The plastic material on the back scratches very easily and you can't just wipe out the scratches
customer_reviews.text: The plastic material on the back scratches very easily and you can't just wipe out the scratches. Image quality is not mind blowing but you do get 28 inches of real estate.
customer_reviews.author: jhh

customer_reviews.title: Too much hassle for the money "saved."
customer_reviews.text: No more Viewsonic for me. My first one died within a year, and this one wouldn't even power up initially. I did return it for warranty service eventually and they did fix it, so the review goes from one star to three star. I haven't had much luck with their monitors lately, but it's a nice monitor for the price. I am keeping a backup monitor, and the shipping box handy. For me it was around 40 bucks to ship, plus hassle factor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great! I have a lot of trouble when viewing ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I have a lot of trouble when viewing web pages on my laptop. I use it as an extended monitor and it works great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darn Red Dots....
customer_reviews.text: Received this monitor a few weeks ago. The monitor is ok but already got a red pixel in the middle of the screen that will not go away...Very annoying... Good thing Amazon has a good return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stahl

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic 28" is Tops!
customer_reviews.text: ViewSonic was and still is one of the top brands in PC Monitors. Crisp, Clear, Clean! And the low price was nice also.
customer_reviews.author: ROSCOE

customer_reviews.title: Alot of real estate at a  good price..
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good monitor for the amount of real estate you get compared to the price paid. The colors seem a little faded and the drivers were a pain to install, even following the advice of other owners. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: RSP

customer_reviews.title: Sold on View Sonics
customer_reviews.text: My old View Sonic went out after 7 yrs., not bad at all for my use, very good. Replaced it with this same sized unit at one half of the cost of the old one, fantastic. I like both my View Sonics, plugged in the new one and on to Brighter and Clearer times. I am completely satisfied and will recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Picture. Integated mounting allowed me to mount to tree in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Integrated mounting allowed me to mount it to the monitor tree in less than 2 minutes! Have HDMI with blue ray running to it as well as KVM switch with 4 machines. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Not Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Nice so far. Decent price, easy to set up, looks good. My sound was set up for HDMI input, once I changed it to Audio IN, everything worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice crisp picture on this monitor made by ViewSonic. This is my third one and I'm very happy with it. ViewSonic makes good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Mynx H.

customer_reviews.title: Good PC Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good PC Monitor, was exactly as described.Fast Shipping, product arrived on time & undamaged, and I overall recommend to anyone who is thinking of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro F.

customer_reviews.title: Screen is good - Stand is not
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is acceptable but the stand is horrible. It sits with the screen at an angle (I'm assuming due to the weight of the screen, although it is very light) so I had to sit the front edge on a book to make it sit at the proper angle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect monitor..works great and good for dual PC connections like I use it
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month and use it for work. Haven't tested it with games , but for detail and graphics it is a great buy. Plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized monitor for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized monitor for our needs. The image is clear and sharp. Easy to assemble stand and set up with computer equipment. Using this monitor with a tablet to increase screen size for intricate school work. Happy with the purchase thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Candace B.

customer_reviews.title: Once calibrated, can't be beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed, I picked up a second one! Needs calibration as expected, but once calibrated, can't be beat for the price! The dual HDMI ports are nice to have as well. I do a lot of remote work on virtual machines and these large screens allow me to view multiple systems with very high resolution. Picture is very crisp, very clear!
customer_reviews.author: Kasha Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor with crisp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor with crisp,clear picture. Speaker system leaves a lot to be desired. It is pretty much useless but I just let my original speakers connected and monitor is great.
customer_reviews.author: gator girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for viewing large screen
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor for viewing large screen, was not impressed with the built in speakers, but that is not what you buy a monitor for!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this baby for my custom build PC in Apr 2016. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Who's the genius @ View sonic who designed the stand? Screen shakes from the slightest vibration.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great video - nice and large, good price - just don't expect anything in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great video monitor - sound is horrible - I have a pair of speakers duct-taped onto the top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob from VA

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my gaming laptop and it performs really well. Colors good, response good, no shadowing.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: ViewSonic VX2858SML is awesome, easy to set up after install a HDMI to DVI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Crawling

customer_reviews.title: ... from here to there on my desk and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It stretches from here to there on my desk and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Large pc monitor
customer_reviews.text: Large computer monitor for a reasonable price. Crystal clear image & sturdy base.
customer_reviews.author: RichP

customer_reviews.title: quality product and great service
customer_reviews.text: product is as expected and delivery was fast. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no problem with this moniton still has perfect picture make switching from xbox to tv easy
customer_reviews.author: HERSH S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor for the price. Very clear and bright. Probably one of the best monitors I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Good bargain for a 28" screen. But there are horizontal lines trailing up and down my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the size the the monitor. Got it as a lightening deal item. Very happy with the purchase. I would give it 5 stars if the black is darker, it is kind of a dark grey. But other than that, a very good purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: COBRA

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitors for the price. Clear and sharp. Even backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Allmon

customer_reviews.title: the lights do flash
customer_reviews.text: In 1982 our company was buying a computer, a "mainframe" DEC (Any smart phone is more powerful, today!). A comment by one of the purchasing team has always stuck with me: "don't be impressed by the flashing lights; they're supposed to flash". The monitor plugged in without trouble, looks great. The stand (criticized elsewhere) is just fine (unless you have regular seismic events, I guess). The only thing that puzzled me for a bit was the HDMI connector/cable. The pictorial instructions weren't clear to me until I read the tags on the ports (the picture intends to show that cable hooked to some other video source; sure doesn't look like my Roku!). I am pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: DogFace

customer_reviews.title: AS advertised and perfect as a larger third screen on my desktop -- ...
customer_reviews.text: AS advertised and perfect as a larger third screen on my desktop -- used only for business so cannot comment on video or gaming.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Image looks good. Has Vesa mount, relatively thin profile. Good value for $$$
customer_reviews.author: TOM A.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the additional real estate.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great value. Wish the stand was a bit more sturdy, and the speakers a little less tinny, but overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gaume

customer_reviews.title: Screen is perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for our office desktops. Screen is perfect for everyday use. Clear no glaring. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Fawhite

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Great clear screen. Stand is a bit flimsy, but for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Just like any other monitor - just BIG
customer_reviews.text: Just got last night - hooked it up. Just like any other monitor - just BIG! LOL
customer_reviews.author: SheCho

customer_reviews.title: Great and recommended...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect companion for my ASUS 27. Big screen for poor eyes! LOL
customer_reviews.author: kgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it right now. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: M-T_Z

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Base is a little sloppy / wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I want from an analog 19 inch to a 28 ...
customer_reviews.text: I want from an analog 19 inch to a 28 inch HD, so the difference was night and day. I cannot say how it compares with other HD monitors
customer_reviews.author: mr kevin don knefel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! Amazing picture quality and large screen size!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor for an excellent price - big and clear! Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: this is a great value.
customer_reviews.text: needed a large VESA monitor. this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: silvermullet

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, can't believe I waited so long to upgrade my monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution for an additional screen in my home office
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution for an additional screen in my home office. I use this as my main monitor and able to use Google Chrome to watch Netflix, etc... Delivery was just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: RedBarnBuys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Speakers are tinny but I have external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Needs more adjustment options
customer_reviews.text: The stand needs to be height-adjustable. Otherwise I'd give it five.
customer_reviews.author: CRW

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor! Image is sharper than any of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor! Image is sharper than any of the other monitors I've owned. Easy to use menu system makes adjustments a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Waltermeyer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: So good that I ordered an additional one for my home officr.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Large monitor; you need a full size desk to ...
customer_reviews.text: Large monitor; you need a full size desk to get the right viewing distance. Works as expected without a lot of calibration. I would definitely by another one.
customer_reviews.author: TangoTrainer

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality but so flimsy and wobbly that a normal typing would cause it to shake.
customer_reviews.text: So far the picture quality is quite good and the price was right. The build quality however is cheap as ever. The case is extremely flimsy feeling and the stand is so God Awful, the monitor would shake if a butterfly landed on it. It was so wobbly that I as starting to get vertigo. I mounted it to a swing arm I had laying around the house and did away with the stand so it is much much better now. All in all, I'm happy with the purchase and what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: ... to dim the screen a bit this has worked great for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Once we were able to dim the screen a bit this has worked great for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: ... of one that lasted about three months before going bad - screen went black
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement of one that lasted about three months before going bad - screen went black. I accepted a replacement rather than trying to find a different brand, but don;t hold out much hope for this one. although I must commend you for agreeing to my requested method for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Eide

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for work. Others were so impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for work. Others were so impressed they bought it, too. It does what I want. Wha more could one ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara1024

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: Monitor was described as a 28 inch monitor. It is not 28 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo H. Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, little low on resolution--but the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: mdr

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use two minitors at work and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use two minitors at work and was missing the space at home...can open compare and work in multiple windows!
customer_reviews.author: LEGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, returned item.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor did not meet expectations. I purchased it for my father. It would turn itself off and on randomly. The picture was often fuzzy (that could have been the cord used to hook it up to laptop). Also, the stand was crooked and could not be adjusted. I returned this item. Appreciate the ease of returning products to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy Stand
customer_reviews.text: As some others noted the stand IS very cheap & flimsy which in my case causes the monitor to sag forward. I needed to place a piece of scrap wood under the front of the stand to raise it up around 1" just to level the screen. Also gave up trying to install drivers from the included cd and checking the Viewsonic website is no help as it doesn't seem to find anything for this model number. The display is fine, it's the stand issue that bothers me the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's computer and she loves it. Large screen with crisp resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Corbitt

customer_reviews.title: Bad Speakers
customer_reviews.text: As monitor is excellent but their speakers are of poor quality, bad hear. If you think buying this monitor for use with your speakers do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Boudewyn

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love my 28" monitor. I've had View Sonic monitors for years & have always been more than satisfied. Working from home a lot & the larger screen really helps ease eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Earps

product_meta.title: HD Digtial TV Antenna with 50Miles Long Range - Detachable Signal Booster Support Full HD 1080P 4K All TVs for Indoor w/Longer Coax Cable
product_meta.description:
The ViewSonic VX2858Sml is a 28” (28” viewable) Full HD 1080p display designed for entertainment and multimedia applications. Equipped with Superscalar Pro technology, true 8-bit colors, and a 3000:1 static contrast ratio, the VX2858Sml delivers superior color performance with excellent color reproduction at nearly any viewing angle. Dual MHL ports enable seamless connectivity and simultaneous battery charging of MHL-enabled mobile devices-facilitating easy content sharing and mobile gaming on a larger screen. The MHL ports can also be used as HDMI ports for basic connection to gaming consoles, set-top boxes, and other multimedia peripherals, while a VGA port provides legacy connectivity. View Sonic's proprietary View Mode provides intuitive presets to deliver optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods. Delivering the ultimate in screen performance and advanced connectivity options, the VX2858Sml is a premium entertainment display for the most demanding of users.

AMAZON.COM


The ViewSonic VX2858Sml is a 28" Full HD 1080p display designed for entertainment and multimedia applications. Equipped with SuperClear Pro technology, true 8-bit colors, a 3000:1 static contrast ratio, and a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio, the VX2858Sml delivers superior color performance with excellent color reproduction at nearly any viewing angle. Dual MHL ports enable seamless connectivity and simultaneous battery charging of MHL-enabled mobile devicesâ€”facilitating easy content sharing and mobile gaming on a larger screen. The MHL ports can also be used as HDMI ports for connection to gaming consoles, set-top boxes, and other multimedia peripherals, while a VGA port provides legacy connectivity. ViewSonic's proprietary ViewMode provides intuitive presets to deliver optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to reduce eye strain from extended viewing periods. Delivering the ultimate in screen performance and advanced connectivity options, the VX2858Sml is a premium entertainment display for the most demanding of users.

KEY FEATURES:
 * HDMI x2 and VGA inputs for flexible connectivity with gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, PCs, digital cameras, and more
 * Supports MHL mobile audio/video interfaces for mobile device charging and sharing mobile device content on a larger screen
 * SuperClear Pro technology with true 8-bit colors, a 3000:1 static contrast ratio, and a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for excellent screen performance
 * Full HD 1080p for all high-definition multimedia applications
 * Proprietary View Mode feature includes Game, Movie, Web, Text, and Mono presets that enhance viewing experience for different scenarios
 * Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter technology for more comfortable viewing
 * 3-year limited warranty and one of the industry's best pixel performance policy for your peace of mind






DUAL HDMI INPUTS FOR DIVERSE FULL HD CONNECTIVITY
HDMI is the highest, future-proof video standard, guaranteed for true digital picture clarity. Equipped with two sets of HDMI inputs, the VX2858Sml display allows you to connect to a variety of devices and peripherals including gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, laptop PCs, digital cameras, and many others for the ultimate true high-definition experience. 

In addition, the dual HDMI ports can also function as MHL ports for easy connectivity to mobile devices.




MHL FUNCTIONALITY FOR EASY CONNECTIVITY TO MOBILE DEVICES
Integrated with Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL), the VX2858Sml enables users to connect compatible mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, directly to the VX2858Sml display**. This allows digital content from mobile devices to be viewed in stunning Full HD resolution on the larger screen of the VX2858Sml, while also simultaneously charging the batteries of the mobile device.




SUPERCLEAR PRO TECHNOLOGY FOR RICHER COLORS, BETTER COLOR GRADIENTS, AND SHARPER IMAGES
SuperClear Pro technology provides true 8-bit color performance that displays 16.7 million undistorted colors, as well as a superior static contrast ratio of 3000:1 and a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for enhanced clarity in the darkest and brightest of images. In addition, MVA panel technology delivers 176Â°/176Â° wide-angle color consistency for uncompromising image quality at virtually any angle.




TRUE 8-BIT PERFORMANCE FOR 16.7 MILLION COLORS
The ViewSonic VX2858Sml utilizes an 8-bit scalar to display 16.7 million true colors on-screen. 8-bit color performance enables smoother gradients and more stable color transitions, ultimately delivering stunning visuals when compared to conventional displays.




BETTER COLOR DEPTH WITH 3000:1 STATIC CONTRAST RATIO
An ultra-high static contrast ratio of 3000:1 offers a wider range of grayscale to show deeper, richer colors with more visible details in shadows and highlights. With a static contrast ratio 3-times higher than standard panels, as well as 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio, the VX2858Sml can display vivid and realistic images for photo editing, watching movies, or any multimedia application.




FULL HD 1080P FOR SUPERIOR PIXEL PERFORMANCE
The ViewSonic VX2858Sml features Full HD 1920x1080 resolution for unbelievable pixel-by-pixel image performance. You'll experience the most amazing clarity and detail whether it be while gaming or enjoying the latest in multimedia entertainment. A 16:9 widescreen ratio minimizes eye fatigue even after hours of playtime, and is perfectly compatible with multi-window viewing without toggling. 




VIEWSONIC FLICKER-FREE TECHNOLOGY
ViewSonic flicker-free displays deliver on the promise of more comfortable viewing. Rather than using Pulse Width Modulation that continuously turns the LED backlight on and off, ViewSonic flicker-free displays use DC modulation backlights that maintain a steady stream of direct current powerâ€”nearly eliminating screen flickering at all brightness levels by providing a constant LED light source. 

This lets you work at your computer, play games, or watch movies longer â€“ without eye fatigue. 




VIEWMODE SETTINGS FOR ENHANCED ON-SCREEN CONTENT
Enjoy excellent performance and accurate color rendering for everything you view on this display. With 5 different scenario presets, ViewSonic displays offer best-in-class calibration techniques to bring you the best digital viewing experience. This includes Game, Movie, Web, Text, and Mono presets to enhance black levels in games and movies, color luster for online images, and color temperature for reading text.




BLUE LIGHT FILTER FOR MORE COMFORTABLE VIEWING
Prolonged exposure to certain levels of blue light can cause eye discomfort. ViewSonic displays feature a Blue Light Filter setting that allows users to adjust the amount of blue light emitted from the screen, enabling longer viewing times and increased eye comfort for work and multimedia applications.




PLANET-FRIENDLY MERCURY-FREE LED BACKLIGHTING
LED backlighting enhances display performance, delivers an outstanding color range, and adjusts contrast ratios for remarkably detailed images. ViewSonic's mercury-free LED backlighting further conserves up to 25%* more energy when compared to conventional displays. In addition, LED backlighting provides for a slim, lightweight profile that saves desktop space.




ECO-MODE CONSERVES MORE ENERGY
ViewSonic's proprietary Eco-mode feature is built into all LED displays, offering options to select ÊºOptimize (75%)Êº or ÊºConserve (65%)Êº settings that save up to 35%* power. Especially in low ambient light, Eco-mode adjusts brightness and improves visibility, while reducing eye fatigue and prolonging the display's lamp life. With Eco-mode, both lamp replacement and energy expenditures are reduced.




VESA-MOUNTABLE
The ViewSonic VX2858Sml features a 100 x 100mm VESA-mountable design that allows you to mount the display on a monitor stand or on a wall, depending on your specific needs. You can easily unscrew the base, and then mount the display on its new stand or wall mount. 




Pixel Performance

Maximum Allowable Sub Pixels

ISO9241-3:2008 Standard

3 Bright
3 Dark
5 Total

ViewSonic Pixel Guarantee

2 Bright
2 Dark
3 Total

INDUSTRY-LEADING PIXEL PERFORMANCE POLICY AND 3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY
One of the aspects that make ViewSonic a display technology leader is its dedication to quality. ViewSonic is committed to using the highest grade panels and offers the industry's leading pixel performance policy. We also back our displays with a 3-year limited warranty for your peace of mind.




WHAT IS IN THE BOX:
 * VX2858Sml display
 * AC / DC adapter
 * Power cable
 * Audio cable
 * VGA cable
 * MHL cable (5-pin)
 * Quick start Guide 
 * ViewSonic Wizard CD (User Guide)

DIMENSIONS AND OTHER FEATURES:
Product Dimensions (W x H x D) with stand: 26.0" x 20.1" x 9.5"
Product Dimensions (W x H x D) without stand: 26.0" x 16.2" x 2.0"
Display Dimensions (W x H): 24.4" x 13.4"; 28" diagonal






 *Energy savings may vary based on actual usage and other factors. **MHL not compatible with Apple devices. May require proprietary cables for funtionality. 
Specifications and availability are subject to change without notice. Selection, offers and programs may vary by country; see your ViewSonic representative for complete details. Corporate names, trademarks stated herein are the property of their respective companies.
